verses.verse: ה֣וֹי <WH1945> Ho Woe רֹעִ֗ים <WH7462> ro-'Im, be unto the pastors מְאַבְּדִ֧ים <WH6> me-'ab-be-Dim that destroy וּמְפִצִ֛ים <WH6327> u-me-fi-Tzim and scatter אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹ֥אן <WH6629> tzon the sheep מַרְעִיתִ֖י <WH4830> mar-'i-Ti of my pasture נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

לָ֠כֵן <WH3651> La-chen Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֜ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD אֱלֹהֵ֣י <WH430> 'e-lo-Hei God יִשְׂרָאֵ֗ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel עַֽל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning הָרֹעִים֮ <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im against the pastors הָרֹעִ֣ים <WH7462> ha-ro-'Im that feed אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּי֒ <WH5971> 'am-Mi my people אַתֶּ֞ם <WH859> 'at-Tem You הֲפִצֹתֶ֤ם <WH6327> ha-fi-tzo-Tem Ye have scattered אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- צֹאנִי֙ <WH6629> tzo-Ni my flock וַתַּדִּח֔וּם <WH5080> vat-tad-di-Chum, and driven them away וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo not פְקַדְתֶּ֖ם <WH6485> fe-kad-Tem and have not visited אֹתָ֑ם <WH853> 'o-Tam; הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni I am about פֹקֵ֧ד <WH6485> fo-Ked them behold I will visit עֲלֵיכֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Chem concerning אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- רֹ֥עַ <WH7455> Ro-a' upon you the evil מַעַלְלֵיכֶ֖ם <WH4611> ma-'al-lei-Chem of your doings נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

וַאֲנִ֗י <WH589> va-'a-Ni, Myself אֲקַבֵּץ֙ <WH6908> 'a-kab-Betz And I will gather אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- שְׁאֵרִ֣ית <WH7611> she-'e-Rit the remnant צֹאנִ֔י <WH6629> tzo-Ni, of my flock מִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> mik-Kol of all הָאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot, out of all countries אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'a-Sher- I הִדַּ֥חְתִּי <WH5080> hid-Dach-ti whither I have driven אֹתָ֖ם <WH853> 'o-Tam שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; them וַהֲשִׁבֹתִ֥י <WH7725> va-ha-shi-vo-Ti them and will bring them again אֶתְהֶ֛ן <WH853> 'et-Hen עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto נְוֵהֶ֖ן <WH5116> ne-ve-Hen to their folds וּפָר֥וּ <WH6509> u-fa-Ru and they shall be fruitful וְרָבֽוּ׃ <WH7235> ve-ra-Vu. and increase

וַהֲקִמֹתִ֧י <WH6965> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti And I will set up עֲלֵיהֶ֛ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem over רֹעִ֖ים <WH7462> ro-'Im shepherds וְרָע֑וּם <WH7462> ve-ra-'Um; over them which shall feed וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor יִֽירְא֨וּ <WH3372> yi-re-'U them and they shall fear ע֧וֹד <WH5750> od any וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- nor יֵחַ֛תּוּ <WH2865> ye-Chat-tu no more nor be dismayed וְלֹ֥א <WH3808> ve-Lo nor יִפָּקֵ֖דוּ <WH6485> yip-pa-Ke-du neither shall they be lacking נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD ס sa-Mek

הִנֵּ֨ה <WH2009> hin-Neh Behold יָמִ֤ים <WH3117> ya-Mim Behold the days בָּאִים֙ <WH935> ba-'Im come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, the LORD וַהֲקִמֹתִ֥י <WH6965> va-ha-ki-mo-Ti that I will raise לְדָוִ֖ד <WH1732> le-da-Vid unto David צֶ֣מַח <WH6780> Tze-mach Branch צַדִּ֑יק <WH6662> tzad-Dik; a righteous וּמָ֤לַךְ <WH4427> u-Ma-lach shall reign מֶ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> Me-lech and a King וְהִשְׂכִּ֔יל <WH7919> ve-his-Kil, and prosper וְעָשָׂ֛ה <WH6213> ve-'a-Sah and shall execute מִשְׁפָּ֥ט <WH4941> mish-Pat judgment וּצְדָקָ֖ה <WH6666> u-tze-da-Kah and justice בָּאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ba-'A-retz. in the earth

בְּיָמָיו֙ <WH3117> be-ya-Mav In his days תִּוָּשַׁ֣ע <WH3467> tiv-va-Sha' shall be saved יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> ye-hu-Dah, Judah וְיִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> ve-Yis-ra-'El and Israel יִשְׁכֹּ֣ן <WH7931> yish-Kon shall dwell לָבֶ֑טַח <WH983> la-Ve-tach; safely וְזֶה־ <WH2088> ve-zeh- and this שְּׁמ֥וֹ <WH8034> she-Mo and this [is] his name אֲ‍ ֽשֶׁר־ <WH834> 'asher- which יִקְרְא֖וֹ <WH7121> yik-re-'O whereby he shall be called יְהוָ֥ה׀ <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צִדְקֵֽנוּ׃ <WH6664> tzid-Ke-nu. prosperity ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֛ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore הִנֵּֽה־ <WH2009> hin-neh- behold יָמִ֥ים <WH3117> ya-Mim Therefore behold the days בָּאִ֖ים <WH935> ba-'Im come נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah-weh; the LORD וְלֹא־ <WH3808> ve-lo- will no יֹ֤אמְרוּ <WH559> Yo-me-ru that they shall no more say עוֹד֙ <WH5750> 'Od longer חַי־ <WH2416> chai- liveth יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, The LORD אֲשֶׁ֧ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הֶעֱלָ֛ה <WH5927> he-'e-Lah which brought up אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> be-Nei the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz out of the land מִצְרָֽיִם׃ <WH4714> mitz-Ra-yim. of Egypt

כִּ֣י <WH3588> ki for אִם־ <WH518> 'im- lo חַי־ <WH2416> chai- liveth יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> Yah-weh But The LORD אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הֶעֱלָה֩ <WH5927> he-'e-Lah which brought up וַאֲשֶׁ֨ר <WH834> va-'a-Sher who הֵבִ֜יא <WH935> he-Vi and which led אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- זֶ֨רַע <WH2233> Ze-ra' the seed בֵּ֤ית <WH1004> beit of the house יִשְׂרָאֵל֙ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El of Israel מֵאֶ֣רֶץ <WH776> me-'E-retz country צָפ֔וֹנָה <WH6828> tza-Fo-nah, out of the north וּמִכֹּל֙ <WH3605> u-mik-Kol all הָֽאֲרָצ֔וֹת <WH776> ha-'a-ra-Tzot, and from all countries אֲשֶׁ֥ר <WH834> 'a-Sher who הִדַּחְתִּ֖ים <WH5080> hid-dach-Tim whither I had driven שָׁ֑ם <WH8033> Sham; they וְיָשְׁב֖וּ <WH3427> ve-ya-she-Vu them and they shall dwell עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- on אַדְמָתָֽם׃ <WH127> 'ad-ma-Tam. in their own land ס sa-Mek

לַנְּבִאִ֞ים <WH5030> lan-ne-vi-'Im because of the prophets נִשְׁבַּ֧ר <WH7665> nish-Bar me is broken לִבִּ֣י <WH3820> lib-Bi Mine heart בְקִרְבִּ֗י <WH7130> ve-kir-Bi, within רָֽחֲפוּ֙ <WH7363> ra-cha-Fu shake כָּל־ <WH3605> kol- All עַצְמוֹתַ֔י <WH6106> atz-mo-Tai, all my bones הָיִ֙יתִי֙ <WH1961> ha-Yi-ti have become כְּאִ֣ישׁ <WH376> ke-'Ish man שִׁכּ֔וֹר <WH7910> shik-Kor, I am like a drunken וּכְגֶ֖בֶר <WH1397> u-che-Ge-ver and like a man עֲבָ֣רוֹ <WH5674> 'a-Va-rov hath overcome יָ֑יִן <WH3196> Ya-yin; whom wine מִפְּנֵ֣י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei because יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> Yah-weh, of the LORD וּמִפְּנֵ֖י <WH6440> u-mip-pe-Nei accept דִּבְרֵ֥י <WH1697> div-Rei and because of the words קָדְשֽׁוֹ׃ <WH6944> ka-de-Sho. of his holiness

כִּ֤י <WH3588> ki for מְנָֽאֲפִים֙ <WH5003> me-na-'a-Fim of adulterers מָלְאָ֣ה <WH4390> mal-'Ah is full הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, For the land כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for מִפְּנֵ֤י <WH6440> mip-pe-Nei for because אָלָה֙ <WH423> 'a-Lah of swearing אָבְלָ֣ה <WH56> 'a-ve-Lah mourneth הָאָ֔רֶץ <WH776> ha-'A-retz, the land יָבְשׁ֖וּ <WH3001> ya-ve-Shu are dried up נְא֣וֹת <WH4999> ne-'ot the pleasant places מִדְבָּ֑ר <WH4057> mid-Bar; of the wilderness וַתְּהִ֤י <WH1961> vat-te-Hi become מְרֽוּצָתָם֙ <WH4794> me-ru-tza-Tam and their course רָעָ֔ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah, is evil וּגְבוּרָתָ֖ם <WH1369> u-ge-vu-ra-Tam and their force לֹא־ <WH3808> lo- not כֵֽן׃ <WH3651> Chen. after that כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for גַם־ <WH1571> gam- again

נָבִ֥יא <WH5030> na-Vi For both prophet גַם־ <WH1571> gam- both כֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> ko-Hen and priest חָנֵ֑פוּ <WH2610> cha-Ne-fu; are profane גַּם־ <WH1571> gam- Even בְּבֵיתִ֛י <WH1004> be-vei-Ti yea in my house מָצָ֥אתִי <WH4672> ma-Tza-ti have I found רָעָתָ֖ם <WH7451> ra-'a-Tam their wickedness נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. the LORD

לָכֵן֩ <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore יִֽהְיֶ֨ה <WH1961> yih-Yeh become דַרְכָּ֜ם <WH1870> dar-Kam Wherefore their way לָהֶ֗ם <WH1992> la-Hem, will be like כַּחֲלַקְלַקּוֹת֙ <WH2519> ka-cha-lak-lak-kOt shall be unto them as slippery בָּֽאֲפֵלָ֔ה <WH653> ba-'a-fe-Lah, [ways] in the darkness יִדַּ֖חוּ <WH1760> yid-Da-chu they shall be driven on וְנָ֣פְלוּ <WH5307> ve-Na-fe-lu and fall בָ֑הּ Vah; כִּֽי־ <WH3588> ki- for אָבִ֨יא <WH935> 'a-Vi therein for I will bring עֲלֵיהֶ֥ם <WH5921> 'a-lei-Hem and רָעָ֛ה <WH7451> ra-'Ah evil שְׁנַ֥ת <WH8141> she-Nat upon them [even] the year פְּקֻדָּתָ֖ם <WH6486> pe-kud-da-Tam of their visitation נְאֻם־ <WH5002> ne-'um- saith יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3069> Yah-weh. God

וּבִנְבִיאֵ֥י <WH5030> u-vin-vi-'Ei in the prophets שֹׁמְר֖וֹן <WH8111> sho-me-Ron of Samaria רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti And I have seen תִפְלָ֑ה <WH8604> tif-Lah; folly הִנַּבְּא֣וּ <WH5012> hin-nab-be-'U they prophesied בַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> vab-Ba-'al, in Baal וַיַּתְע֥וּ <WH8582> vai-yat-'U to err אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- עַמִּ֖י <WH5971> 'am-Mi and caused my people אֶת־ <WH853> 'et- יִשְׂרָאֵֽל׃ <WH3478> Yis-ra-'El. Israel ס sa-Mek

וּבִנְבִאֵ֨י <WH5030> u-vin-vi-'Ei also in the prophets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֜ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim of Jerusalem רָאִ֣יתִי <WH7200> ra-'I-ti I have seen שַׁעֲרוּרָ֗ה <WH8186> sha-'a-ru-Rah, an horrible thing נָא֞וֹף <WH5003> na-'of they commit adultery וְהָלֹ֤ךְ <WH1980> ve-ha-Loch and walk בַּשֶּׁ֙קֶר֙ <WH8267> bash-She-ker in lies וְחִזְּקוּ֙ <WH2388> ve-chiz-ze-Ku they strengthen יְדֵ֣י <WH3027> ye-Dei also the hands מְרֵעִ֔ים <WH7489> me-re-'Im, of evildoers לְבִ֨לְתִּי־ <WH1115> le-Vil-ti- no שָׁ֔בוּ <WH7725> Sha-vu, doth return אִ֖ישׁ <WH376> 'ish that none מֵרָֽעָת֑וֹ <WH7451> me-ra-'a-To; from his wickedness הָֽיוּ־ <WH1961> ha-yu- have become לִ֤י <WH99999> li כֻלָּם֙ <WH3605> chul-Lam All כִּסְדֹ֔ם <WH5467> kis-Dom, they are all of them unto me as Sodom וְיֹשְׁבֶ֖יהָ <WH3427> ve-yo-she-Vei-ha and the inhabitants כַּעֲמֹרָֽה׃ <WH6017> ka-'a-mo-Rah. thereof as Gomorrah ס sa-Mek

לָכֵ֞ן <WH3651> la-Chen Therefore כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- thus אָמַ֨ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Therefore thus saith יְהוָ֤ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָאוֹת֙ <WH6635> tze-va-'Ot of hosts עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- concerning הַנְּבִאִ֔ים <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im, concerning the prophets הִנְנִ֨י <WH2005> hin-Ni I am going מַאֲכִ֤יל <WH398> ma-'a-Chil Behold I will feed אוֹתָם֙ <WH853> o-Tam לַֽעֲנָ֔ה <WH3939> la-'a-Nah, them with wormwood וְהִשְׁקִתִ֖ים <WH8248> ve-hish-ki-Tim and make them drink מֵי־ <WH4325> mei- the water רֹ֑אשׁ <WH7219> Rosh; of gall כִּ֗י <WH3588> Ki, for מֵאֵת֙ <WH853> me-'Et נְבִיאֵ֣י <WH5030> ne-vi-'Ei for from the prophets יְרוּשָׁלִַ֔ם <WH3389> ye-ru-sha-Lim, of Jerusalem יָצְאָ֥ה <WH3318> ya-tze-'Ah gone forth חֲנֻפָּ֖ה <WH2613> cha-nup-Pah is profaneness לְכָל־ <WH3605> le-chol all הָאָֽרֶץ׃ <WH776> ha-'A-retz. into all the land פ Peh

כֹּֽה־ <WH3541> koh- Thus אָמַ֞ר <WH559> 'a-Mar Thus saith יְהוָ֣ה <WH3068> Yah-weh the LORD צְבָא֗וֹת <WH6635> tze-va-'ot, of hosts אַֽל־ <WH408> 'al- not תִּשְׁמְע֞וּ <WH8085> tish-me-'U Hearken עַל־ <WH5921> 'al- unto דִּבְרֵ֤י <WH1697> div-Rei not unto the words הַנְּבִאִים֙ <WH5030> han-ne-vi-'Im of the prophets הַנִּבְּאִ֣ים <WH5012> han-nib-be-'Im that prophesy לָכֶ֔ם la-Chem, מַהְבִּלִ֥ים <WH1891> mah-bi-Lim unto you they make you vain הֵ֖מָּה <WH1992> Hem-mah like אֶתְכֶ֑ם <WH853> 'et-Chem; חֲז֤וֹן <WH2377> cha-Zon a vision לִבָּם֙ <WH3820> lib-Bam of their own heart יְדַבֵּ֔רוּ <WH1696> ye-dab-Be-ru, they speak לֹ֖א <WH3808> lo from מִפִּ֥י <WH6310> mip-Pi [and] not out of the mouth יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> Yah-weh. of the LORD

No evil
